des: Offer a full scope of services for children from birth to 18 years of age, meeting their evolving healthcare needs as they grow into adulthood.
Prevention, diagnosis and treatment of the most common diseases.Emergency and emergency medical care;
Offer Cardiac Nutrition therapy,Cancer nutritional status assessment, dietary management after chemotherapy, Nutritional care before and after dialysis
A cardiologist specializes in diagnosing and treating diseases of the cardiovascular system.
Completed specialist training in medicine and surgery of the eyes.Carry out eye tests, diagnose and treat all eye diseases and perform eye surgery.
Orthopedics, or orthopedic services, aim at the treatment of the musculoskeletal system. This includes your bones, joints, ligaments, tendons, and muscles
